summary: This is a small texture mod I made. It adds a small elvish (Tengwar) writing (red glow)to the blade of the Daedric Sword. Current version :1.3
descriptionHtml:
This is a small texture mod that adds elvish (Tengwar) writing (red glow)to the blade of the Daedric Sword. Download the file that has v1.3 in it.

I dunno how good it may or may not be as I\'m just starting to play around with Skyrim modding and Photoshop manipulation. 

Any suggestions to gain experience in photoshop/modding is welcome. 

UPDATE/Note: Apparently it adds the elvish writing to the Greatsword and the Dagger as well. Huh...dint know they shared the same texture file. I guess one stone...3 birds.

NOTE: The Bluish White Glow version: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7166

v1.4: Made the inscription sharper. Decreased glow spread and increased glow intensity.

To Do:

1. Bluish White glow version. X - DONE
2. Dragon Inscriptions.
3. Elven Swords Elven Inscription.

v1.3: Fixed font size discrepancy.

v1.2: Flipped Elvish writing to make it look better oriented. I think there\'s a size discrepancy in the writing between the sections of the sword. Will fix that eventually.

v1.0: Original File.
Installation:

Extract the contained data folder into ur Skyrim installation folder. 

Any suggestions on coloring or more effects welcome. I\'m just starting out so i\'m sure i\'ve got a LOT to learn :)
author: zanazaar

files.name: Daedricsword Tengwar Writing Corrected Orientation
files.changelogHtml:
Flipped orientation of Tengwar writing.
Size discrepancy appears to exist. Will fix that later.
